publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2485.1 Dr Richard Simpson: World Alzheimer’s Day 2008—As an amendment to motion (S3M-2485) in the name of Margaret Smith, insert at end "and further acknowledges the leading role being played in this field by the Dementia Services Development Centre at the University of Stirling." Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support

S3M-2485.1 World Alzheimer’s Day 2008 (lodged on 9 September 2008) Alasdair Morgan*, Robin Harper*, James Kelly*, Karen Gillon*, Liam McArthur*, Hugh Henry*, John Park*, Ms Wendy Alexander*, Ken Macintosh*, David Stewart*, Andy Kerr*, Elaine Smith*, Jackson Carlaw*, Des McNulty*, Jamie McGrigor*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Iain Gray*, Marlyn Glen*, Bashir Ahmad*, Rhona Brankin*, Gil Paterson*, Helen Eadie*

S3M-2485.1 Dr Richard Simpson: World Alzheimer’s Day 2008—As an amendment to motion (S3M-2485) in the name of Margaret Smith, insert at end "and further acknowledges the leading role being played in this field by the Dementia Services Development Centre at the University of Stirling." Supported by: Alasdair Morgan, Robin Harper, James Kelly, Karen Gillon, Liam McArthur, Hugh Henry, John Park, Ms Wendy Alexander, Ken Macintosh, David Stewart, Andy Kerr, Elaine Smith, Jackson Carlaw, Des McNulty, Jamie McGrigor, Mr Frank McAveety, Iain Gray, Marlyn Glen, Bashir Ahmad, Rhona Brankin, Gil Paterson, Helen Eadie
S3M-2485.1 World Alzheimer’s Day 2008 (lodged on 9 September 2008) Marilyn Livingstone*
S3M-2485.1 World Alzheimer’s Day 2008 (lodged on 9 September 2008) Mary Mulligan*
S3M-2485.1 World Alzheimer’s Day 2008 (lodged on 9 September 2008) Rhoda Grant*
S3M-2485.1 World Alzheimer’s Day 2008 (lodged on 9 September 2008) Angela Constance*
S3M-2485.1 World Alzheimer’s Day 2008 (lodged on 9 September 2008) Tom McCabe*
